column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////First the place is busy and it nice to see the place full of customer because that's a good sign. But what a disappointment it is
column2: we needed some utensils and they were all dirty. The forks still have food stuck on them
column3: the spoon was stain with coffee stain
column4: and the knife was spotty from soapy water. They were being lazy on the cleaning. The bottom of the plate have food stuck to them. It was so cross that I want to leave but we already order our food so might as well finish it.
